module sd_crc_16 (
    input BITVAL,
    input Enable,
    input CLK,
    input RST,
    output reg [15:0] CRC
);

    always @(posedge CLK or posedge RST) begin
        if (RST) begin
            CRC <= 16'h0;
        end else if (Enable) begin
            CRC <= {CRC[14:0], BITVAL ^ CRC[15]};
        end
    end

endmodule

module sd_crc_16 (
    input BITVAL,
    input Enable,
    input CLK,
    input RST,
    output reg [15:0] CRC
);

    always @(posedge CLK or posedge RST) begin
        if (RST) begin
            CRC <= 16'h0000;
        end else if (Enable) begin
            CRC <= {CRC[14:0], BITVAL ^ CRC[15]};
        end
    end

endmodule

);

        if (RST) begin
            CRC <= 16'h0000;
        end else if (Enable) begin
            CRC <= {CRC[14:0], BITVAL ^ CRC[15]};
        end
    end

endmodule
